question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/Types/MinerList.cs] [Function: GenerateFirstRoundOfNewTerm() overload] [Input Validation] Can an attacker pass a currentRound with RoundNumber = Int64.MaxValue, causing overflow in the first overload at line 49 when incrementing round number?
